headline: BNY Mellon Global Equity Income Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: BNY Mellon Global Equity Income Fund (Classes A and I at NAV) outperformed its benchmark index, the FTSE World Index, during the third quarter of 2024. Read more here.
